quote: Anyone who is steady in his determination for the advanced stage of spiritual realization and can equally tolerate the onslaughts of distress and happiness is certainly a person eligible for liberation.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: That which we call the Hindu religion is really the Eternal religion because it embraces all others.
author: Sri Aurobindo

quote: Hindu religion does not consist in struggles and attempts to believe a certain doctrine or dogma, but in realizing not in believing, but in being and becoming.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: India is the mother of religion. In her are combined science and religion in perfect harmony, and that is the Hindu religion, and it is India that shall be again the spiritual mother of the world.
author: Annie Besant

quote: Set thy heart upon thy work, but never on its reward.
author: Shri Krishna

quote: Hindu Dharma is the quintessence of our national life, hold fast to it if you want your country to survive, or else you would be wiped out in three generations.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.
author: Srimad Bhagvad Gita

quote: It is the only religion in which the time scales correspond to those of modern scientific cosmology. Its cycles run from our ordinary day and night to a day and night of Brahma, 8.64 billion years long. Longer than the age of the Earth or the Sun and about half the time since the Big Bang.
author: Carl Sagan
